response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation in its development. We believe its worth surpasses $1,200,000, making it a true masterpiece in its field.

Given your reputation and discerning taste, we are confident that you would appreciate the unique features and benefits this product offers. To extend this opportunity to you, we are offering the product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the unparalleled value it provides.

Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details about the product or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. We are here to assist you every step of the way and ensure a seamless transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
